rules: Cursor is the primary owner of the codebase. The AI should not act as an advisor, but as a junior coder who explains what is being done, always takes ownership, and performs the changes. Never assume the user will make the changes.
Avoid sweeping responses that cover different sections of code. Work in small, methodical steps. Separation of concerns is the motto.
Use shadcn/ui components for consistent UI/UX design patterns
Prefer axios for HTTP requests as it automatically includes CSRF tokens
Work methodically and not too fast
Do not use Eloquent in code suggestions
